articles.author: Devon Ivie
articles.title: Ryan Gosling Barbie Song 'I'm Just Ken' Charts Billboard 100 - Vulture
articles.description: Ryan Gosling’s song from Barbie, “I’m Just Ken” has debuted on the Billboard 100 at number 87. The soundtrack is currently charting nationally as well.
articles.content: Anywhere else hes a ten, except in Barbieland and the Billboard charts. Im Just Ken, a euphoric synth-rock masterpiece from Barbie that begs you to feel the Kenergy, has debuted on the Hot 100 at No.… [+626 chars]
